headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Slashers
content: In the latest Adversary Mode to hit GTA Online, thereâ€™s no such thing as a fair fight. One team gets shotguns and license to indulge their bloodlust, while the other gets nothing but a flashlight and a sense of overwhelming panic. The good news is that every minute the roles change, and vengeance is very, very sweet. Last team standing wins.
